products.name: Handmade Tangyuan
products.description: Tangyuan are soft, chewy rice balls made by hand. They are often filled with sweet sesame or red bean paste and served in warm water or syrup.

products.name: Handmade rice cake
products.description: Handmade rice cake is a traditional Chinese snack made from glutinous rice. It’s pounded until soft and chewy, then often served plain, rolled in soybean powder, or filled with sweet red bean paste.

products.name: Handmade nougat candy
products.description: Handmade nougat candy is a chewy, sweet treat made with nuts and sugar.

products.name: Handmade Qingtuan
products.description: Handmade Qingtuan are soft, green rice dumplings made with glutinous rice and mugwort. They’re usually filled with sweet red bean paste and eaten during spring festivals.

products.name: Handmade green bean cake
products.description: Handmade green bean cake is a soft, sweet Chinese dessert made from mashed mung beans, sugar, and a little oil. It has a delicate flavor and smooth texture, often enjoyed during tea time or festivals.

products.name: Orange juice
products.description: Orange juice is made by pressing fruits or vegetables right before drinking. It’s natural, tasty, and full of vitamins.

products.name: Handmade cold noodles
products.description: Handmade cold noodles is a popular Chinese cold noodle dish made from wheat or rice flour. It’s chewy, served with spicy sauce, vinegar, garlic, and vegetables—perfect for hot days.

products.name: Handmade lemon tea
products.description: Handmade lemon tea is specially designed for health-conscious consumers, using sugar substitutes instead of sucrose to reduce calorie intake. It includes health-preserving ingredients like goji berries and red dates, combining deliciousness and health benefits.

products.name: Handmade health-preserving tea
products.description: Handmade health-preserving tea are natural drinks made from herbs or fruits to help you stay well.

products.name: Handmade plum tea
products.description: Handmade plum tea is a tangy, sweet drink made from real plums. It’s refreshing, natural, and full of fruity flavor.

products.name: Handmade Mango Pomelo Sago
products.description: Handmade Mango Pomelo Sago is a refreshing Hong Kong-style dessert drink made with mango, pomelo, coconut milk, and sago pearls. It’s sweet, creamy, and fruity.

products.name: Handmade soy milk latte
products.description: Handmade soy milk latte is a smooth, creamy drink made with fresh soy milk and espresso (or tea). It’s dairy-free, naturally nutty, and gently sweet.

products.name: Cold-brew tea concentrate
products.description: Cold-brew tea concentrate is a strong, smooth tea made by steeping tea leaves in cold water for hours. It’s less bitter and perfect for mixing with water or milk.

products.name: Steamed rice cake
products.description: Steamed rice cake is a soft, chewy snack made from rice flour and water, cooked by steaming. It’s mild in flavor and often served with sweet or savory toppings.

products.name: Osmanthus cake
products.description: Osmanthus cake is a light, sweet Chinese dessert made with rice flour and fragrant osmanthus flowers. It has a delicate floral aroma and a soft, jelly-like texture.

products.name: Dragon Hair Cake
products.description: Dragon Hair Cake (Dragon’s Beard Candy) is a traditional Chinese sweet made from stretched sugar and maltose, forming fine, silky threads. It’s light, melt-in-your-mouth, and often filled with peanuts or sesame.

products.name: Honey water
products.description: Honey water is a gentle, soothing drink made by mixing pure honey with warm or cold water. It’s natural, lightly sweet, and often enjoyed for wellness and hydration.

products.name: Handmade Chinese Pretzel
products.description: Handmade Chinese pretzel (Mahua) is a crispy, twisted snack made from wheat flour, sugar, and oil. It’s golden brown, crunchy, and slightly sweet or savory—perfect for snacking!

products.name: Apple juice
products.description: Apple juice is a sweet, refreshing drink made from pressed apples. It’s naturally tasty and full of fruit flavor.

products.name: Grape juice
products.description: Grape juice is a sweet, fruity drink made from pressed grapes. It’s refreshing and packed with natural flavor.
